extraction_prompt: I have a sports team named '{team}' playing the sport '{sport}'. Which specific league do they play in? Return ONLY the league name (e.g., 'NBA', 'Premier League', 'IPL'). If unsure, say 'Unknown'.
verification_prompt: I have a team named '{team}' and an AI predicted they play in '{league}'. The sport is '{sport}'. Is this correct? Reply 'CORRECT' if yes. If no, reply with the ACTUAL league name only.
